overview: Renowned jazz pianist Kenny Werner speaks before a live audience about his "Effortless Mastery" concept, a program he developed -- based on his popular book -- to help musicians and other creative people overcome obstacles that prevent them from tapping deeply into their creative talent. The system has had a profound impact on numerous artists, allowing them to get rid of self-consciousness, apprehension, negative inner voices and stress.
title: Kenny Werner: Effortless Mastery
